author: boudoul
body:
TrackerTopology migration in StackedTrackerGeometry (should fix the TTI scenario : 12800) 
The 2023muondev scenario was not completely synchronized after the change #8670 - this PR is also adressing this

The StackedTrackerGeometry will eventually disappear but the trackertoplogy migration is an intermediate step to get the workflows running before removing it
title: Fixing StackedTracker Geom + 2023Muondev Synchronized
